body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! This is Russell Miller from Serene Flow Yoga Studio. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Russell. I'm Katherine Torres. I came to your studio yesterday, and I couldn't find any yoga mats. I was really looking forward to my session.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m so sorry to hear that, Katherine. We indeed had an inventory hiccup with our yoga mats. Can I have your phone number and email address to keep you updated on when they’re back in stock?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is four one five - two two two - five six seven eight, and my email is katherine.t@yogalove.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Katherine. Just to confirm, that was four one five - two two two - five six seven eight, and katherine.t@yogalove.com, correct?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I have noted down your details. We will send you an update by tomorrow. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you for your help, Russell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Katherine. And again, I apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and for your time. Have a great day!
